Jan 27 (Reuters) - Abrdn PLC ABDN.L:: *ABRDN PLC - PROPOSED SECONDARY PLACING *ABRDN PLC - ANNOUNCES PROPOSED SALE OF APPROXIMATELY 40 MILLION ORDINARY SHARES OF ITS SHAREHOLDING IN PHOENIX GROUP HOLDINGS PLC *ABRDN PLC - ABRDN INTENDS TO RETURN NET PROCEEDS OF PLACING TO SHAREHOLDERS *ABRDN - PRICE/PLACING SHARE WILL BE DETERMINED BY AN ABB PROCESS TO INSTITUTIONAL INVESTORS FACILITATED BY GOLDMAN SACHS INTERNATIONAL


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 27-JAN-202217:05:36.53 GMT
